meta.title: Dokos — One App. 30+ Formats. Infinite Possibilities.
meta.description: Dokos is a native desktop document reader for developers. Supports 18+ file formats: Markdown with LaTeX and Mermaid, JSON, YAML, CSV, PDF, Jupyter Notebooks and more. Built with Tauri 2 and Rust.

hero.subtitle: The high-performance reader for developers. Edit Markdown, visualize JSON, and diff code instantly without the bloat of an IDE.

formats.heading: Native Support for 18+ Formats
formats.subheading: No plugins required. It just works.

visualFeatures.mermaidDesc: Render flowcharts and sequence diagrams inline.
visualFeatures.latexDesc: Beautiful math typesetting for technical papers.
visualFeatures.jsonGraphDesc: Interactive node graph for nested data structures.
visualFeatures.csvPowerTableDesc: Sort, filter, and search large datasets easily.
visualFeatures.swaggerUiDesc: Test APIs directly from your documentation.

multitasking.heading: Built for Multitasking
multitasking.tabsDesc: Keep 20+ files open without losing context. Drag and drop to split views horizontally or vertically.
multitasking.searchDesc: Instantly find any string across all open files and projects. Regex supported.
multitasking.sessionsDesc: Close the app and pick up exactly where you left off. Your workspace is always saved.

profiles.heading: Who is Dokos for?
profiles.developersDesc: Quickly read code snippets, review PRs locally, and edit config files without launching a heavy IDE.
profiles.devopsDesc: Visualize Kubernetes YAMLs, diff server configs, and parse massive log files instantly.
profiles.writersDesc: Focus on writing with a distraction-free Markdown editor that handles math and diagrams perfectly.
profiles.dataDesc: Preview Jupyter notebooks, CSV datasets, and JSON outputs without spinning up a local server.

performance.heading: Native Performance.
performance.description: Built with Tauri 2 and Rust, Dokos uses a fraction of the memory of Electron apps. It's security-first, blazing fast, and respects your battery life.

ctaFinal.availableFor: Available for macOS, Windows, and Linux.

footer.privacyIntro: At Dokos, your privacy matters. This policy explains how we handle your data when you use our application.
footer.privacyDataContent: Dokos is a local-first application. Your files are processed entirely on your device. We do not collect, transmit, or store any of your documents or personal data on our servers.
footer.privacyStorageContent: All preferences and settings are stored locally on your device. We do not use cookies or tracking technologies within the application.
footer.privacyContactContent: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at hello@dokos.app.
footer.termsIntro: By using Dokos, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
footer.termsUsageContent: Dokos is provided for personal and commercial use. You may install and use it on any number of devices you own.
footer.termsLiabilityContent: Dokos is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of the application.
footer.termsChangesContent: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of Dokos constitutes acceptance of any changes.
